item.title: 3.2 Deploying with a Blue/Green Deployment Strategy for DevOps Services
item.description: 3.2 Deploying with a Blue/Green Deployment Strategy for DevOps Services Automating CI/CD deployment through DevOps service Prerequisites Refer to 4.1.1 Installing NGINX Ingress Controller to install Nginx Ingress Controller in advance. Create a DevOps project Use the previously created project as it is, or create a new one. Automating application deployment Use Code Repository to Manage Application Code As a sample, we will create and test our pre-made Nginx-based web app.
